casebody.data:
HIGH POINT BANK AND TRUST COMPANY
v.
HIGHMARK PROPERTIES, LLC, et al. No. 8PA14-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Sept. 24, 2015. Alan B. Powell, High Point, for High Point Bank and Trust Company. Ellis B. Drew, III, Winston-Salem, for Highmark Properties, LLC, et al. Christopher Charles Finan, High Point, for High Point Bank and Trust Company. Matthew Allen Lawson Anderson, for High Point Bank and Trust Company. Ann G. Sugg, for Highmark Properties, LLC, et al. G. Christopher Olson, Raleigh, for N.C. Advocates for Justice. Frank Goldsmith, Marion, for N.C. Advocates for Justice.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th of August 2014 by Plaintiff for the Court to Take Judicial Notice:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of September 2015."
ERVIN, J. recused.
